sentences: Marko "Mare" Kon (Serbian Cyrillic: Марко Кон; born 20 April 1972) is a Serbian recording artist.
Kon considers his collaboration with the rapper Gru on his 1995 album as his "big breakthrough" in the industry.
In 2009, Kon collaborated with Milan Nikolić to perform "Cipela" at the Eurovision Song Contest 2009.
